Amazing culinary experience. Peruvian dishes are served in a delicious new style while still maintaining their classic flavors. Their roasted cauliflower steak, octopus and sushi bombs are a MUST. Dont skip dessert, trust me.

Outstanding service and cuisine.  South of Fifth has many nice restaurants but this is the standout.  Duck and foie dumplings and the corn cake stuffed with spicy lobster were excellent.  A must visit in Miami.

The owner is very kind, generous and attentive. We felt at home. Only had a few drinks at the bar but service was awesome. Bar tenders Oscar and Chris were phenomenal. Highly recommend this restaurant and will definitely come back!
